name: Hole Lifes
description:
Some little creature are exploring the great hole under the ground.

They are hardworking but weak. You need to help them survive from the harmful underground environment.

How to play?
  • Drag and drop to assign work to the minions
  • Manage your resources
  • When minions are so happy(with the pink effect), make a camp there to let two happy guy do their thing :)
hints
  • minions work more efficient when they are happy
  • they will be happy when they eat and drink enough
  • minion parents will share half of their resources to their baby

BGM used

Theme song - 水平線の使者

Ending song - 向日葵が見る景色

from 魔王魂公式
